evidence: Clear separation of concerns with distinct modules: models, strategies, and core components
High cohesion within modules (e.g., all database-related code in database.py and models/ directory)
Low coupling between modules through well-defined interfaces and dependency injection
Single deployment unit with internal modularity rather than distributed services
Presence of a main entry point (__main__.py) indicating monolithic execution
Shared database access pattern across modules
Average fan-out of ~5 indicates moderate inter-module dependencies
risks: Directory depth of 3 may indicate some complexity in module organization
Maintainability index average of 68.8 suggests moderate code complexity
Some modules like binance_api_manager.py have high internal complexity
